channel.title: [PI] Range Body Armor
channel.description:
I am using a 317 PI server. My problem is:
On some of the range armor like d hide bodies or leather bodies, range becomes glitchy. By that I mean the arms become invisible and the arms go behind the char. I have tried searching for some tuts but haven't found a working one so far.
Please no Let me Google That For You. I have done that already, but if I have missed the tut and you have it please share. If you can just post the fix because you know it, that's perfect as well.

item.title: [PI] Range Body Armor
item.dc:creator: @igli igli
item.description:
@igli wrote:

Thanks I’ll try that.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Range Body Armor
item.dc:creator: @runeherorsps runeherorsps
item.description:
@runeherorsps wrote:

that means they’re in wrong part.
They must be in the “platebodies” section, you have to switch it to chainbodies

Read full topic
